department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Ali Baron holds a B.F.A. in Film and Television from NYU's Tisch School of the Arts. She has been a professional editor in Los Angeles for over 10 years. She has cut numerous TV shows such as Extreme Makeover-Home Edition (ABC), The Real Housewives of New York (Bravo), Kid Nation (CBS), The Glee Project (Oxygen), as well as many, many shows you've never heard of.  She has worked on feature length documentaries such as Ted Haggard: Scandalous (TLC) and The September Issue directed by R.J. Cutler which had a theatrical release. She loves the craft of editing and thinks it is a really creative, rewarding career.
